name: Sirtet - Modernized Tetris
description:
Getting tired of the old Tetris? Already beaten Tescend, the Great Tetris Adventure?
Maybe what you want is Tetris with a modern design? Well, Sirtet is for you!

Sirtet is at its core what makes Tetris great, but with the added knowledge of what hardcore gamers want. Mainly a progression system.
Challenge yourself with Sirtet and unlock new abilities after each level.

Will you be able to beat one of the greatest challenge in Tetris History?

Controls:
Arrow keys - move
Space - confirm/rotate
Escape - return/give up
M - mute/unmute
F1/F2 - resize (exe only)

Made in a few days in GameMaker for LowRez Jam 2018.
Musics made in BeepBox, and composed respectively by Philip Glass, Michael Giacchino and Max Richter.
